answers.answer: How thirsty are you?  Are you insatiably thirsty,  and you can't drink enough water so you have to have constant access to water,  or are you a little more thirsty than normal?Next doctor's appointment, mention this,  in case it is gestational diabetes.

Well i notice this morning i was very thirsty and all day i was fine then right now after i took a bath again. I do get thirty but today was different from every time i so. And i will mention it to him. Is that bad? Can it affect my baby?
I have not been drinking water as much tho because it was making me feel sick so can it be that im not getting enough fluids maybe??

If you haven't been drinking as much as usual,  it is probably that you're a little dehydrated and pregnant women need more fluids than other women.If you find yourself unable to satisfy your thirst,  or others notice you're really constantly drinking water is when it becomes a problem.You'll be tested for diabetes in pregnancy either way.Best wishes.
